snippet: Bernard Hopkins, 49, said he would return to the ring despite a crushing loss over the weekend to Sergey Kovalev.
abstract: Boxer Bernard Hopkins will return to ring despite suffering crushing loss to Sergey Kovalev, ending retirement speculation.
lead_paragraph: Bernard Hopkins, 49, said he would return to the ring despite a crushing loss over the weekend to Sergey Kovalev.

headline.main: Hopkins Says He’s Still in the Game
